publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-381.1 Stewart Stevenson: European Constitution—As an amendment to motion (S2M-381) in the name of Phil Gallie, leave out from "affecting" to end and insert "of the constitution of the EU which seeks to reserve power over fishing to the sole competence of the EU is incompatible with Scotland’s interests." Supported by: Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Mr Bruce McFee*, Fiona Hyslop*, Alex Neil*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Shiona Baird*
